Effect

Class ResourceBonus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Effect.Effect
      • Effect.ResourceBonus

  • public class ResourceBonus
extends Effect
    Object representation of any card or stage effect which grants a resource bonus to the player. A resource bonus consists of the addition of one or more of seven types of resources. If the resource bonus provides a choice between multiple resource types, the player can select one of the types of resources to use per turn; otherwise, the resource is always available. Only resources granted by wonderboards, brown structures, or gray structures are available to be purchased from adjacent neighbors.
